description: This notification is sent when a new Event
is received from the Event framework and the
corresponding entry is created/modified.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::escNewEvents SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventIndex i 9999 SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventClusterId s EXAMPLE SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventClusterName s EXAMPLE SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventNodeName s EXAMPLE SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventVersion i 9999 SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventClassName s EXAMPLE SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventSubclassName s EXAMPLE SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventSeverity i 0 SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventInitiator i 0 SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventPublisher s EXAMPLE SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventSeqNo C 9999 SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventPid C 9999 SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventTimeStamp C 9999 SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventData s EXAMPLE

description: An index to refer to a cluster event. The index numbers
increase monotonically as events are added to the MIB
and the oldest events are deleted from the MIB. If the
MIB is restarted, the index number restarts from 1.
Different instances of this MIB may have different
index numbers for the same event instance
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventIndex

description: The unique cluster ID of the cluster sending this event
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventClusterId

description: The name of the cluster sending this event
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventClusterName

description: The name of the cluster node sending this event
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventNodeName

description: The version number of this event
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventVersion

description: The name of the event class
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventClassName

description: The name of the event subclass
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventSubclassName

description: The severity of this event
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventSeverity

description: The initiator of this event
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventInitiator

description: the event publisher
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventPublisher

description: the subclass-unique sequence number for this event
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventSeqNo

description: the process ID of the event issuer
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventPid

description: the difference, measured in milliseconds, between the
current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventTimeStamp

description: the detail data of the event
variables.name: SUN-CLUSTER-EVENTS-MIB::eventData
